items.sentence: The doctor said he wants you to quit smoking.
We have all the evidence against you we need.
We should do something together next weekend.
We'll have to do it even if we don't want to.
We'll probably be a bit tired after the hike.
Would you mind telling me where you're going?
This is one of the best books I've ever read.
We weren't really expecting to find anything.
Would you mind if I asked you some questions?
We'd all be interested in your point of view.
I'm only interested in doing the right thing.
It's just something I've been thinking about.
I don't want to discuss my problems with you.
Doing that wouldn't have made any difference.
What makes you think that it was Tom's fault?
This kind of thing doesn't happen very often.
Tom has a face that people immediately trust.
Things are finally starting to come together.
We need someone to take care of this problem.
That could be the answer to all our problems.
